```{r data cleaning}
southeast = c("AL", "GA", "SC", "TN", "MS", "KY")

pell <- read.csv("./pell.csv") %>% 
    rename(
        state = STATE,
        award = AWARD,
        recipient = RECIPIENT,
        name = NAME,
        session = SESSION,
        year = YEAR
    ) %>% 
    filter(year==2017) %>% 
    filter(state %in% southeast) %>% 
    select(!(name:session)) %>% 
    group_by(state) %>% 
    summarise_at(c("award", "recipient"), sum, na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
    mutate(
        award = case_when(
            state == "GA" ~ award/10700000,
            state == "TN" ~ award/6590000,
            state == "AL" ~ award/4851000,
            state == "KY" ~ award/4420000,
            state == "SC" ~ award/4893000,
            state == "MS" ~ award/2986000,
        ),
        award_rank=rank(award, ties.method="random"),
        recipient_rank=rank(recipient, ties.method="random"),
        award_lab = glue::glue("${round(award, 1)}M/c"),
        recipient_lab = glue::glue("{round(recipient/10^3, 1)}k"),
        state_lab = case_when(
            state == "MS" ~ "<b>MS</b>",
            TRUE ~ state
        )
    )
```

```{r ggplot settings}
theme_set(theme_void(base_family="Roboto Condensed"))
theme_update(
    legend.position="none",
    plot.margin=margin(10, 10, 10, 10, unit="pt"),
    plot.background=element_rect(fill="#e5e7e7"),
    plot.title=element_markdown(color="grey10",
                                size=20,
                                family="Roboto Black",
                                face="bold",
                                lineheight=1.2),
    plot.subtitle=element_markdown(color="grey30",
                                   size=13,
                                   lineheight=1.2,
                                   margin=margin(t=15, b=60)),
    plot.caption=element_text(color="grey75",
                              size=10,
                              margin=margin(t=75))
)
```

```{r figure}
ggplot(pell) + 
    geom_sigmoid(
        aes(x = -10, xend = 10, 
            y = award_rank, 
            yend = recipient_rank, 
            group = state,
            color = award_rank), 
        alpha = .45, smooth = 8, size = 1.2
    ) +
    geom_point(
        aes(x = -10,
            y = award_rank,
            color = award_rank),
            shape = "|",
            size = 8
    ) +
    geom_point(
        aes(x = 10,
            y = recipient_rank,
            color = recipient_rank),
            shape = "|",
            size = 8
    ) +
    geom_text(
        aes(x = -11,
            y = award_rank,
            label = award_lab),
        hjust = 1,
        fill = NA
    ) +
    geom_text(
        aes(x = 11,
            y = recipient_rank,
            label = recipient_lab),
        hjust = 0,
        fill = NA
    ) +
    geom_richtext(
       aes(x = -11,
           y = award_rank,
           label = state_lab),
       hjust = 1,
       nudge_x = -15,
       fill = NA,
       label.size = NA
    ) +
    geom_richtext(
       aes(x = 11,
           y = recipient_rank,
           label = state_lab),
       hjust = 0,
       nudge_x = 10,
       fill = NA,
       label.size = NA
    ) +
    coord_cartesian(clip = "off") +
    scale_x_continuous(expand = c(.2, .2)) +
    scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0)) +
    labs(title="Mississippi recieved the<br>highest**Pell Grant**<br>funding per capita<br>while having the<br>fewest students.",
         subtitle="Check out how many recipients they have.",
         caption = "Insipred by CÃ©dric Scherer | Visualizaiton by Bear Jordan")
```
